Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitCustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerService
public interface FlipFitCustomerInterface
Interface defining operations for FlipFit customer management.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCustomer(int userId, String name, String phoneNumber, String address)

    Edits the profile of an existing customer.

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      void createCustomer(int userId, String name, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Creates a new customer with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      name - The name of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(int userId, String name, String phoneNumber, String address) throws UserNotFoundException
      Edits the profile of an existing customer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user/customer to edit.
      name - The updated name of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number of the customer.
      address - The updated address of the customer.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the specified user ID is not found.

    • viewGyms

      List<FlipFitGym> viewGyms()
      Retrieves a list of gyms available in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGym objects representing gyms.

    • viewSlots

      HashMap<String,Integer> viewSlots(int gymId, String date)
      Retrieves available slots for a specified gym on a given date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym to view slots for.
      date - The date for which slots are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A HashMap where keys represent slot times and values represent slot capacities.

    • filterSlots

      void filterSlots()
      Filters slots based on certain criteria. Actual implementation may vary based on filtering requirements.
